channel.title: NPR Topics: National
channel.description: NPR coverage of national news, U.S. politics, elections, business, arts, culture, health and science, and technology. Subscribe to the NPR Nation RSS feed.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: The FBI seizure of Georgia 2020 election ballots relies on debunked claims
item.description: An FBI investigation of the 2020 election in Fulton County, Ga., was initiated by a lawyer who aided President Trump's unsuccessful efforts to overturn that election, an unsealed affidavit says.
item.content:encoded:
An FBI investigation of the 2020 election in Fulton County, Ga., was initiated by a lawyer who aided President Trump's unsuccessful efforts to overturn that election, an unsealed affidavit says.

(Image credit: Mike Stewart)
item.dc:creator: Stephen Fowler

item.title: Federal judge acknowledges 'abusive workplace' in court order
item.description: The order did not identify the judge in question but two sources familiar with the process told NPR it is U.S. District Judge Lydia Kay Griggsby, a Biden appointee.
item.content:encoded:
The order did not identify the judge in question but two sources familiar with the process told NPR it is U.S. District Judge Lydia Kay Griggsby, a Biden appointee.

(Image credit: Steve Helber)
item.dc:creator: Carrie Johnson

item.title: Do you have some bad habits? Good news â€” you can make new ones. Here's how
item.description: Research shows it helps to start small if you want new habits to stick.
item.content:encoded: Research shows it helps to start small if you want new habits to stick.
item.dc:creator: Marielle Segarra

item.title: Snowboarder Chloe Kim is chasing an Olympic gold three-peat with a torn labrum
item.description: At 25, Chloe Kim could become the first halfpipe snowboarder to win three consecutive Olympic golds.
item.content:encoded:
At 25, Chloe Kim could become the first halfpipe snowboarder to win three consecutive Olympic golds.

(Image credit: Lindsey Wasson)
item.dc:creator: Rachel Treisman

item.title: A person has been detained for questioning in Nancy Guthrie disappearance, sheriff says
item.description: The Pima County Sheriff's Department said a "subject" was detained during a traffic stop south of Tucson, Ariz., hours after authorities released images of a potential suspect.
item.content:encoded:
The Pima County Sheriff's Department said a "subject" was detained during a traffic stop south of Tucson, Ariz., hours after authorities released images of a potential suspect.

(Image credit: Ty ONeil)
item.dc:creator: Alana Wise

item.title: DHS faces funding deadline. And, courts fast-track Somali asylum seeker hearings
item.description: Congress has until Friday to reach a deal to fund the Department of Homeland Security. And, several asylum cases filed by Somali migrants in immigration courts were suddenly fast-tracked.
item.content:encoded:
Congress has until Friday to reach a deal to fund the Department of Homeland Security. And, several asylum cases filed by Somali migrants in immigration courts were suddenly fast-tracked.

(Image credit: Chip Somodevilla)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: How the use of AI and 'deepfakes' plays a role in the search for Nancy Guthrie
item.description: As artificial intelligence becomes more advanced and common, it's hard to know what's real or not, complicating the search for Nancy Guthrie, according to law enforcement. But just how difficult is it?
item.content:encoded:
As artificial intelligence becomes more advanced and common, it's hard to know what's real or not, complicating the search for Nancy Guthrie, according to law enforcement. But just how difficult is it?

(Image credit: Caitlin O'Hara)
item.dc:creator: Ayana Archie

item.title: In Minneapolis, red knit hats become a symbol of resistance among protesters
item.description: A hand-knit red hat is catching on with protesters in Minnesota. It takes inspiration from a symbol of resistance to Nazi occupation.
item.content:encoded: A hand-knit red hat is catching on with protesters in Minnesota. It takes inspiration from a symbol of resistance to Nazi occupation.
item.dc:creator: Hosts

item.title: In New Orleans, some Mardi Gras groups swap plastic beads for glass for parade throws
item.description: More and more parades in New Orleans now feature glass beads instead of plastic ones during Mardi Gras.
item.content:encoded: More and more parades in New Orleans now feature glass beads instead of plastic ones during Mardi Gras.
item.dc:creator: Drew Hawkins

item.title: Savannah Guthrie releases video pleading for her mother's return
item.description: "Today Show" co-host Savannah Guthrie is pleading with the public for help as the search for her mother stretches into its second week.
item.content:encoded: "Today Show" co-host Savannah Guthrie is pleading with the public for help as the search for her mother stretches into its second week.
item.dc:creator: Bill Chappell
